sourcesContent:
import { Container ,Row ,Col ,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { fetchAlltickets } from './TicketsAction' import { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import { TicketTable } from '../../components/ticket-table/TicketTable.comp' import tickets from '../../assets/data/dummy-tickets.json' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export const Dashboard = () => { const dispatch =useDispatch() const [str , setStr] = useState(""); const [dispTicket ,setDispTicket] = useState(tickets) useEffect (()=>{ dispTicket(fetchAlltickets()) },[str ,dispTicket]) return (
Total tickets:
Pending tickets:
Recently Added tickets
) }
